tweet.text: In 1988, Secretary of State Shultz attended the G-7 economic summit. He’s photographed here with President Reagan during the final plenary session on June 21, 1988 in Toronto, Canada. 📷 @Reagan_Library https://t.co/WBjFeu0FoE
